name: A Spring In Your Step
description:
A Spring In Your Step is a Rhythm adjacent platformer, where your special moves have to be synced to the beat! Play through 1 challenging level repeatedly as the beat, and thus mechanics, become more complex!

Controls:

  • WASD/ARROW KEYS / LEFT STICK:  Movement
  • W / UP ARROW / A BUTTON: Jump/Double Jump
  • SPACE/ B BUTTON: Dash
  • ESCAPE: return to menu / quit
  • U Key: toggle the rhythm mechanics. This is a cheat for if you just wanna mess around with the character controller.
  • MOUSE: use menu buttons

This game was made for "TOJAM2021", whose theme was "Once more, with feeling!", by Silver Lewis, JohnLee Cooper, and Austin Heller.
